predictions.article: Trade war escalates as retaliatory tariffs hit struggling farm economy
predictions.prediction: Due to the escalation of the trade war and retaliatory tariffs, U.S. agricultural export volumes to China, Canada, and Mexico will decrease by at least 10% within the next month.

predictions.article: USDA announces next steps for economic and disaster relief
predictions.prediction: The USDA's announced economic and disaster relief will lead to a 5% increase in farmer sentiment as measured by the Ag Economy Barometer within the next two months.
